|brand = ASUS |model = RT-ACRH13 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = November 21, 2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_RT-ACRH13 |wlclass = AC1300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTACRH00 |icid = 3568A-RTACRH00 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1244-01001065-50Z |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4018; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 710 <!-- 710 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25N01GVZEIG; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L1606EM2I-12G; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC64M16GP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = AC:9E:17, 38:D5:47 |oui = AC:9E:17, 38:D5:47
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;159, 649E, 633;2;;QFN-16; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;SKY85728-11, 610NT, 1610, MY;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.50.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = LEDE Project, OpenWrt
|availability = US |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/11/2016 |estreldate = 09/10/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 889349497791 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833320341 |asin = B01LXL1AR8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com
"1244-01001065-50Z" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|ASUS RT-AC58U|Edimax}} FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTACRH00 MSQ-RTACRH00] (2016-08-11) :Equipment: Wireless-AC1300 Dual Band Gigabit Router :Brand Name: ASUS; Model No.: [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3094140 FCC Report] *'''ASUS RT-ACRH13''', RT-ACRH00, (RT-AC53HP ?) *[[ASUS RT-AC58U]], RT-AC58MU, RT-AC58HP, RT-AC58UHP *ASUS RT-AC1200G+ B1 ([[ASUS RT-AC1200GP B1]]) *[[ASUS RT-AC1300G+]], ASUS RT-AC1300G+ B1 *ASUS RT-AC1300HP, [[ASUS RT-AC1300UHP]] <!-- :9SIA4UG5529395, 9SIA47J6GP1317, 9SIAA7W6151551 --> :Default settings are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3094139 FCC label]. <!--{{FCC ST|02/07/2017|indexme.}}-->
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.guru3d.com/news-story/asus-rt-ac58u-dual-band-802-11ac-wifi-router.html ''ASUS RT-AC58U'' on '''Guru3D'''] *[http://benchmarkreviews.com/39519/asus-rt-ac58u-wi-fi-router-announced/ ''ASUS RT-AC58U'' on '''BenchmarkReviews'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/rtac58u/ ''ASUS RT-AC58U'' Review on '''OpenITforum'''] *[http://www.mbreviews.com/asus-rt-acrh13-review/ ''ASUS RT-ACRH13'' on '''MBReviews''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1596-asus-rt-ac58u-quadcore-z-wifi-ac1300/ ''ASUS RT-AC58U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] :[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/207-asus-rt-ac58u/ Gallery on '''OpenITforum'''] ([https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1490-asus-przedstawia-router-rt-ac58u/ PR]) :OUI: 38:D5:47 *[http://w3w.openrouter.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=14&t=4246 ''Asus RT-AC58U (IPQ4018)'' on '''OpenRouter''' forums] :[http://www.tech-blog.pl/pliki/asus_rt-ac58u_1.jpg PCB image] [http://www.tech-blog.pl/pliki/asus_rt-ac58u_2.jpg CPU, Flash, RAM image] *[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX ''LEDE/Openwrt for IPQ4019/IPQ4028 devices'' on '''chunkeey''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-acrh13 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-ac58u |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-for-asus-wireless-ac1300-rt-acrh13/1133/13 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Notes== *'''Quad-Core Processor''' - Responsive network performance and data handling *'''128MB Memory''' for Multi-Tasking - Fast memory architecture enables :stable multiple simultaneous download streams on multiple devices *'''Super-Fast Wi-Fi''' - Dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi with concurrent speeds :up to 867Mbps (5GHz) and 400Mbps (2.4GHz) *'''Improved Wi-Fi Range''' - Four external 5dBi antennas for improved :Wi-Fi range and multi-device performance *'''MU-MIMO''' - High technology for the best multi-device performance *'''USB 3.0''' - Up to 10x faster data transfer speeds
===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC1300'' (400Mbps [2.4 GHz] + 867Mbps [5 GHz]) * Antennas: 4x external high-gain 5dBi antenna * Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 1x ''USB 3.0'' * Vendor firmware features: : MU-MIMO, Smart QoS, Parental Control, Guest Network, : VPN server: L2TP Pass-Through, PPTP Server, OpenVPN Server : VPN client: PPTP client, L2TP client, OpenVPN client : AiCloud personal cloud service, AiDisk : 3G/4G data sharing, Printer Server * Vendor firmware operation modes: : wireless router, access point * Power Supply: AC Input: 110~240V (50~60 Hz) : DC Output: 12V with max. 1.5A current * Dimensions: 207 x 148.8 x 35.5 mm (LxWxH) * Weight: 395 g
==See also== *ASUS RT-ACRH13 (US) - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-ACRH13/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH17]] (US) - ''AC1700 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • *[[ASUS RT-AC42U]] (EU) - ''AC1700 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • *[[ASUS RT-AC58U]] (EU) - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC58U/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AC82U]] - ''AC3100 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' • ([https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/shared/model.c QCA])
